abstract: Virginia H Knauer, head of the Office of Consumer Affairs under three presidents, dies at age 96.
snippet: As head of the Office of Consumer Affairs under three presidents, Mrs. Knauer pushed for consumer protections, favoring persuasion over regulation.
lead_paragraph: As head of the Office of Consumer Affairs under three presidents, Mrs. Knauer pushed for consumer protections, favoring persuasion over regulation.

headline.main: Virginia Knauer, Consumer Advocate, Dies at 96
headline.seo: Virginia Knauer, Consumer Advocate, Dies at 96
